content.text: OOXML w:b (bold) tester: ST_OnOff variants, rStyle-only cases, rStyle + inline overrides, and a linked style pair (paragraph+character) to verify behavior.
A) ST_OnOff values for <w:b> on a run:
C) rStyle + inline <w:b> combinations (inline overrides style):
Plain style, inline turns bold on
- rStyle='SD_LinkedHeadingChar' (character side of linked pair) => expect bold:
Linked Char style applied to run
Paragraph style makes text bold, but inline turns it off here
All runs inherit bold from the paragraph style
